channel.title: CVE Feed for Palantir -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Palantir -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-30954|2024-08-29T14:49:41.543Z -- palantir -- com.palantir.video%3Avideo-application-server
item.description: The Gotham video-application-server service contained a race condition which would cause it to not apply certain acls new videos if the source system had not yet initialized.

item.title: CVE-2023-30968|2024-08-21T15:33:34.678Z -- palantir -- com.palantir.acme.gaia%3Agaia
item.description: One of Gotham Gaia services was found to be vulnerable to a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could have allowed an attacker to bypass CSP and get a persistent cross site scripting payload on the stack.

item.title: CVE-2023-30968|2024-03-12T19:39:24.226Z -- palantir -- com.palantir.acme.gaia%3Agaia
item.description: One of Gotham Gaia services was found to be vulnerable to a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could have allowed an attacker to bypass CSP and get a persistent cross site scripting payload on the stack.

item.title: CVE-2023-30968|2024-08-02T14:45:24.296Z -- palantir -- com.palantir.acme.gaia%3Agaia
item.description: One of Gotham Gaia services was found to be vulnerable to a stored cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability that could have allowed an attacker to bypass CSP and get a persistent cross site scripting payload on the stack.
